mapper.select: SELECT ITEM.item_code, ITEM.main_image, ITEM.title, MEMBER.nickname, CATEGORY.cat_name, ITEM.target_sum, ITEM.cur_sum, TRUNC((CUR_SUM/TARGET_SUM)*100, 0) as PERCENT, ITEM.summary, TRUNC(SYSDATE-ITEM.CLOSINGDATE,0) as TIME, TO_CHAR(ITEM.CUR_SUM, '999,999,999,999') as NOW_SUM FROM LIKES LEFT OUTER JOIN ITEM on LIKES.item_code=ITEM.item_code LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER on ITEM.EMAIL=MEMBER.EMAIL LEFT OUTER JOIN CATEGORY on ITEM.cat_code = CATEGORY.cat_code where ITEM.item_code = 48

SELECT DISTINCT ITEM.main_image, ITEM.item_code, ITEM.title, MEMBER.nickname, CATEGORY.cat_name, ITEM.target_sum, ITEM.cur_sum, TRUNC((CUR_SUM/TARGET_SUM)*100, 0) as PERCENT, ITEM.summary, TRUNC(SYSDATE-ITEM.CLOSINGDATE,0) as TIME, TO_CHAR(ITEM.CUR_SUM, '999,999,999,999') as NOW_SUM FROM LIKES LEFT OUTER JOIN ITEM on LIKES.item_code=ITEM.item_code LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER on ITEM.EMAIL=MEMBER.EMAIL LEFT OUTER JOIN CATEGORY on ITEM.cat_code = CATEGORY.cat_code where ITEM.item_code in (select ITEM_CODE from LIKES where EMAIL=#{email})
mapper.delete: delete LIKES where email = #{email} and item_code = #{item_code}
mapper.select: SELECT ITEM.email, ITEM.item_code, ITEM.main_image, ITEM.title, MEMBER.nickname, ITEM.target_sum, ITEM.cur_sum, ITEM.summary, ITEM.closingdate, SELLER.image, SELLER.info, TRUNC(SYSDATE-ITEM.CLOSINGDATE,0) as TIME, TO_CHAR(ITEM.CUR_SUM, '999,999,999,999') as NOW_SUM, TRUNC((CUR_SUM/TARGET_SUM)*100, 0) as PERCENT FROM ITEM LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER on ITEM.EMAIL=MEMBER.EMAIL LEFT OUTER JOIN SELLER on MEMBER.EMAIL=SELLER.EMAIL where ITEM.email = #{email}
